column1: Smoque BBQ////I ordered their ribs again
column2: while my wife ordered their brisket sandwich and my son ordered his kids meal brisket sandwich. Both sandwiches were packed full of meat. My wife ordered their bbq beans while I ordered their brisket chilli. I would have to say their bbq beans tasted a lot better. They were sweeter and completed the rest of the meal a lot better. The brisket was so tender and perfeclty smoked. The meat just literally fell apart. The ribs were also perfect smoked and seasoned. Only thing I'm really not a big fan of is their cole slaw. Needs more flavor.
